ErrataDetailsV1.description: Provides detailed information for the erratum that matches the specified advisory name, supporting update management.

example.description: This update fixes critical security vulnerabilities in OpenSSL.
example.notes: Please restart affected services after applying this update.
example.solution: Run zypper patch to apply this update.

advisory_status.description: Shows the current status of the advisory, such as stable or pending, for update management.

description.description: A detailed explanation of the advisory, outlining its purpose and impact.

notes.description: Additional notes regarding the advisory, providing extra context or instructions.

product.description: The product associated with the advisory, used for identification and management.

release.description: Indicates the release number associated with the advisory, supporting version tracking.

restart_suggested.description: A boolean flag signaling a weather reboot of the package manager is advisable following the application of the errata. This is commonly used to address update stack issues before proceeding with other updates.

solution.description: Describes the recommended solution or remediation for the advisory, supporting resolution.

synopsis.description: A brief summary of the advisory, outlining its main points and impact.

topic.description: The topic covered by the advisory, providing context for the update or fix.

type.description: Specifies the type of advisory, such as security or bugfix, for classification purposes.

update_date.description: The date when the advisory was last updated, helping track changes and revisions for the erratum.

vendor_advisory.description: Information provided by the vendor regarding the advisory, supporting compliance and tracking.

ErrataDetailsV1.title: ErrataDetailsV1

info.description: Easing your life in administering SAP applications. Trento is an open-source web application, built by SUSE, to enhance day-2 operations of SAP workloads. It can be used to proactively prevent infrastructural issues by diagnosing common issues, validate systems configuration against best practices, and remove toil from routine OS tasks on mission-critical systems.
info.title: Trento

get.description: Returns detailed information about a specific user, identified by their unique ID, supporting user management and administrative review.

parameters.description: Unique identifier of the user whose details are being requested. This value must be an integer.
parameters.name: id

200.description: Detailed information about the specified user, including entity version for concurrency control.

patch.description: Updates the details of an existing user. This is a conditional HTTP request; you must provide the entity version using the If-Match header to ensure safe updates and concurrency control.

parameters.description: Unique identifier of the user to be updated. This value must be an integer.
parameters.name: id

parameters.description: The entity version of the user, provided in the If-Match header, to ensure safe and conditional updates.
parameters.name: if-match

requestBody.description: Request containing updated user information and entity version for safe and conditional updates.

201.description: User account updated successfully, returning the updated user details and entity version for concurrency control.
